channel.title: OH WOW ! Records-Podcast
channel.itunes:author: OH WOW Team
channel.description: This is the OH WOW ! Records Podcast from Duesseldorf Germany. We will povide you with music from and with our Artists,new release and just discussions about music in general. Main Genres are house,Electro and Break Beat..Oh..and some good Hip Hop as well. Please visit http://www.myspace.com/ohwowrecords and http://ohwowmusic.wordpress.com/ for more Infos on Artists,Dates,Releases and more.
channel.itunes:subtitle: The official OH WOW ! Records Podcast for'ya. You got the best of Breaks, Hip Hop, Electro and loads of other Styles plus infos on the OH WOW ! Artists and their releases
channel.itunes:summary: This is the OH WOW ! Records Podcast from Duesseldorf Germany. We will povide you with music from and with our Artists,new release and just discussions about music in general. channel.itunes:keywords: music, breaks, house, Matt Flores, Lee Bass, germany, minimal, electro, nu rave, Oh, wow, records, label, mixes

item.title: Episode 19 - Gato Preto Tschukudu Promo Mix
item.itunes:author: Gato Preto
item.description:
This is our FREE mixtape for our upcoming Tschukudu EP on Riot Riot Records.It will be released on the 20th of January with remixes by Flore,Access Denied and Hanuman Tribe.
Also make sure you get the FREEBIE EP here for free:
http://gatopreto.bandcamp.com/album/tschukudu-freebie-ep-for-free
Tracklist: 1. Gato Preto-Tschukudu (Ertu+Pushkin Remix) 2. Gato Preto-Tschukudu (Lee Bass Remix) 3. N.O.H.A. - Yemanja (Gato Preto Remix) 4. Sinden - HIGH DEMAND feat. Jesse Boykins III (Lucky Beard Dub Remix) 5. Diamond Bass - Straight Up 6. Gato Preto-Tschukudu (Flore Remix) 7. Gato Preto - Dinheiro Negro 8. Lee Bass - Edelweiss (Hat + Hoodie Remix) 9. Drop The Lime - Shake Baby Shake (Dj Dizzy Remix) 10. Gato Preto-Tschukudu (feat. B'Crazy)
http://gato-preto.net http://youtube.com/gatopretomusic http://soundcloud.com/gato-preto http://facebook.com/GatoPretoMusic
item.itunes:subtitle: This is Gato Preto's Promo Mix to celebrate their Tschukudu EP out on 20th of January on Riot Riot Records

item.title: Episode 18 - Gato Preto present: The Voodoo Drums Mixtape
item.itunes:author: Gato Preto
item.description:
The mysterious black cat is a music project by soul and funk singer Carmen Brown and Dj / Producer Lee Bass. Both having their roots in Africa they were influenced by different blends of African music.
This mixtape is a mixture of Baile Funk,Moombathon and different flavours of tropical bass music which shall give everybody an idea of what is rocking the world of Gato Preto including their highly acclaimed first single "Tschukudu" to be released on RioRiot Records end of June 2011.Carmen's vocals spice up this hot rocking soup of african flavours.Enjoy.
www.facebook.com/GatoPretoMusic www.soundcloud.com/gato-preto
item.itunes:subtitle: Lee Bass + Carmen Brown present: Gato Preto's first Mixtape full of Baile Funk,Favela House and Moombathon
item.itunes:summary:
The mysterious black cat is a music project by soul and funk singer Carmen Brown and Dj / Producer Lee Bass. Both having their roots in Africa they were influenced by different blends of African music.
This mixtape is a mixture of Baile Funk,Moombathon and different flavours of tropical bass music which shall give everybody an idea of what is rocking the world of Gato Preto including their highly acclaimed first single "Tschukudu" to be released on RioRiot Records end of June 2011.Carmen's vocals spice up this hot rocking soup of african flavours.Enjoy.
www.facebook.com/GatoPretoMusic www.soundcloud.com/gato-preto
item.itunes:keywords: Music, Baile Funk, Carmen Brown, Lee Bass, Gato Preto, Moombathon, Crookers, Schlachthof Bronx, Munchi

item.title: Episode 16 - JayJay + Lee Bass: Yo! Electro Raps Mixtape
item.itunes:author: JayJay + Lee Bass
item.description:
JayJay + Lee Bass present: Yo! Electro Raps Mixtape:
Which fact do have all styles of electronic music in common? Pretty simple answer: BASS... Therefor it ain' t no surprise when a Dj and a vocalist team up in order to do music which melt into all different styles: JayJay and Lee Bass present the "Yo! Electro Raps Mixtape".
Lee Bass has been addicted to all different styles of modern Club Music: Breaks, Electro, House and Dubsteo are all part of his productions and Dj-Sets. He's also one half of the project called I:LYKE, is promoting parties and running the label OH! Wow Music.
JayJay as a vocalist has already released 3 Singles in Germany which have caused a hype on the internet. The single "Elektrorap" straight hit the German Dj Charts and his long awaited EP "Altstadt Pionier" will be released this summer.
This mixtape should give you guys an impression of what you can expect on this EP.
JayJay + Lee Bass present finest club-music with no restriction to genres. Even if you don't understand german: music speaks no language :). Give it a listen and you know what we mean.
Enjoy
Links: www.myspace.com/40jayjay www.myspace.com/djleebass www.myspace.com/ilyke07
item.itunes:subtitle: Jay Jay + Lee Bass present: Yo! Electro Raps Mixtape Links: www.myspace.com/40jayjay www.myspace.com/djleebass www.myspace.com/ilyke07

item.title: Episode 15 - Oldschool Megaman Mix by Lee Bass
item.itunes:author: Lee Bass
item.description:
It was in round about 2003 / 2004 when Lee Bass got hit by a sound called 2 Step and Garage. And ths was the time when he recorded this mix in order to play at the very big " Sonne Mond Sterne " Festival... This mix was the ticket to the Dj Contest there which he won at the end..
Lotta nice moments are connected to this mix so its time to share it with you..
Please visit www.myspace.com/djleebass for more infos
item.itunes:subtitle: This Episode of the OH WOW ! Podcast gives you an oldschool 2 Step Mix from 2003 by label manager Lee Bass.Pure 2 Step and Garage Stuff / 100% Vinyl ! www.myspace.com/djleebass / www.myspace.com/ohwowrecords
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: Episode 12 Lee Bass IdzIdz-UmpUmp-Mix
item.itunes:author: Lee Bass
item.description:
Oi Oi Oi !!. Lee Bass is part of the I:LYKE project where he and Flatt Mores combine many different styles to create sumtin new...
Djing was and still is Lee Bass' s first love and his love for different flavours of highly energetic Club Music can be heard in his fresh new mix... rave kids !!
Check www.myspace.com/djleebass // www.myspace.com/ilyke07 // www.myspace.com/londonbassmusic
item.itunes:subtitle: This Episode of the OH WOW ! Podcast gives you a cross over genre flowing mix by label manager Lee Bass.Pure Bassline and Booty madness ! www.myspace.com/djleebass / www.myspace.com/ohwowrecords

item.title: Episode 10 Claas Reimer November Rain Set
item.itunes:author: Claas Reimer
item.description:
If you are into minimal and techno this mix will fit you. Claas Reimer is an artist from duesseldorf in germany, which is pretty close to minimal music capital cologne.
He likes different tastes of music and represents these in his sets and releases. for more infos on his music check out www.myspace.com/claasroom and www.myspace.com/ohwowrecords

item.title: Episode 9 Audiotrucs Rocker Mix
item.itunes:author: Audiotrucs
item.description:
Audiotrucs a.k.a. Mighty Fruitz are a music duo from Berlin.Under the project Mighty Fruitz they released music on Carepack. There new project Audiotrucs is straight forward club sound with various tastes like electro, glitch, house and break-beat. Check this mix out and check their tunes as well.
myspace.com/audiotrucs , myspace.com/ohwowrecords
item.itunes:subtitle: OH WOW Podcast provides you with The Rocker Mix by Audiotrucs from Berlin. Check myspace.com/ohwowrecords , myspace.com/audiotrucs

item.title: Episode 7 Lee Bass presents: The Boxer Bangaranga
item.itunes:author: Lee Bass
item.description: Oi Oi Oi !!. Lee Bass is a very busy artist. Taking care of 2 Labels, producing different styles of music, doing events in his hometown Duesseldorf and...of course... djing. This mix gives you an overview of his different styles like breaks, hip hop, electro and bassline music. You can be sure of hearing lotta bootlegs and unreleased tunes. For infos check out www.myspace.com/djleebass
item.itunes:subtitle: Wow! Its getting hot in here.This Episode of the OH WOW ! Podcast gives you an exclusive mix by label manager Lee Bass.Pure Bassline and Booty madness ! www.myspace.com/djleebass / www.myspace.com/ohwowrecords
